GSD.product_version: versions from v4.7 to before v4.9.337
GSD.description:
drivers: mcb: fix resource leak in mcb_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.337 by commit 531ac7b911a962b3b29565dad6ea6b5c3fad3317, it was introduced in version v4.7 by commit 7bc364097a89a0a9a5e5e4989d6b3e6fb2027a9e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drivers: mcb: fix resource leak in mcb_probe()
